title: CoI Framework-Based Collaborative Learning Strategies for Online Learning Design (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and fundamental social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Application of the three CoI framework elements (cognitive, teaching, and social presence) in smartphone-based mobile environments

learning_goals: Learners can design learning activities applying the three core elements of the CoI framework in mobile environments for one week
Learners can improve their online discussion designs to achieve over 80% participation rates based on peer feedback
Learners can execute at least three communication strategies to enhance social presence in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
